__data__.response:
This is the start of a test. I'll provide some sample data and you can try to generate metrics based on it.

**Data:**

Let's say we have a dataset of user interactions with an e-commerce website. The data includes:

| User ID | Product Name | Purchase Date | Quantity | Price |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | iPhone 13 | 2022-01-01 | 2 | 999.99 |
| 1 | MacBook Air | 2022-01-05 | 1 | 1299.99 |
| 2 | Samsung TV | 2022-01-10 | 3 | 899.99 |
| 3 | iPhone 13 | 2022-01-15 | 1 | 999.99 |
| 4 | MacBook Pro | 2022-01-20 | 2 | 1799.99 |

**Task:**

Your task is to generate the following metrics based on this data:

1. Average order value (AOV)
2. Conversion rate
3. Average revenue per user (ARPU)
4. Customer lifetime value (CLV)

Please provide your answers in a format like this:

| Metric | Value |
| --- | --- |
| AOV | 1234.56 |
| Conversion Rate | 0.25 |
| ARPU | 1000.00 |
| CLV | 5000.00 |

Go ahead and generate the metrics!
